tidbits.title: Biodiversity Haven
tidbits.description: French Guiana is a haven for biodiversity, hosting the Guiana Amazonian Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, teeming with diverse flora and fauna.

tidbits.title: Space Exploration
tidbits.description: The Guiana Space Centre, Europe's spaceport, is located in French Guiana, launching satellites and spacecraft, playing a pivotal role in space exploration.

tidbits.title: Cultural Melting Pot
tidbits.description: The region is a cultural melting pot, with influences from indigenous peoples, Creole traditions, and a blend of European, African, and Asian heritages.
